name: Polycom-print
tagline: Small website to find your local printer. Made for Polycom Inc.
body:
### How to Use
Using this is as easy as knowing where you are. Simply click on the country, region, or office to use your local printer.

### Demo
A live example is available [here](#), and should be up to date.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the site? Check out our [documentation](https://github.com/izaclorimer/polycom-print/wiki) or [contact me](mailto:electricgord@gmail.com) and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
